nodes.text: A Gathering, one of the most sacred rituals of the Jedi Order, took place during the Clone Wars. Jedi younglings Byph, Ganodi, Gungi, Katooni, Petro and Zatt, escorted by Padawan Ahsoka Tano, traveled to the planet Ilum to claim the kyber crystals they would use to construct their own lightsabers.
